name: Fenders
description:
Fenders is a 2 vs 2 racing game ! Cooperate with your teammate to win the race against your two opponents !

- Syncronize your actions to pilot your speeder 

- Repair your speeder during the race

- Be the best team and win the race against your friends !

We recommend to play the tutorial !

For the best experience,  play the game with 4 players. You can also play alone or with 2 players if you want a taste of the game !

You will need as much XBox controllers as the number of players. 

This game is a prototype realized in a month with a team of seven people.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Marco Bazaud - Lead Game Design, Sound Design, Level Design

Martin Perez - Game Design, Gameplay Programmer

Raphaël Maréchal - Game Design, UI Design

Thomas Boucher - Lead Game Artist, Animation Artist, 3D Artist

Quentin Fontanel - Environnement Artist, Texture Artist, 3D Artist

Mathilde Lapalce - Character Artist, 3D Artist, 2D Artist

Arthur Pouce - Visual Effects Artist, 3D Artist

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made with :

Autodesk Maya, Unity 3D, Substance Designer, Substance Painter, FMod Studio, Aura2, Photoshop.

Common Bug: you seem to not control your character anymore. It's often a bug due to misconnections with fragile Gamepad connectors. Try to launch the game again.
